pr_title: KAFKA-10647; Only serialize owned partitions when consumer protocol version >= 1

timeline.message: KAFKA-10647; Only serialize owned partition when consumer protocol version >= 0

timeline.bodyText: nit: A better general pattern is to use assertEquals comparing against empty list. Then if the assertion fails, the message will show what was in the collection.
timeline.author: hachikuji

timeline.bodyText: Does it compare to incorrect object (maybe assignment.userData())?
timeline.author: chia7712
